alert.note: Alert for Marion; Warren (Iowa) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Severe Thunderstorm Warning issued August 29 at 7:35AM CDT until August 29 at 8:15AM CDT by NWS DesMoines
info.description: The National Weather Service in Des Moines has issued a * Severe Thunderstorm Warning for... Western Marion County in south central Iowa... Southeastern Warren County in south central Iowa... * Until 815 AM CDT. * At 735 AM CDT, a severe thunderstorm was located just south of Indianola, moving east at 30 mph. HAZARD...Half dollar size hail. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Damage to vehicles is expected. * This severe thunderstorm will be near... Milo and Ackworth around 745 AM CDT. Sandyville around 750 AM CDT. Pleasantville around 800 AM CDT. Melcher-Dallas around 805 AM CDT. Other locations impacted by this severe thunderstorm include Otter Creek County Park, Ackworth, Lacona, Milo, Lake Ahquabi State Park and Sandyville. HAIL THREAT...RADAR INDICATED MAX HAIL SIZE...1.25 IN WIND THREAT...RADAR INDICATED MAX WIND GUST...<50 MPH
info.instruction: For your protection move to an interior room on the lowest floor of a building.
